name: autoEmptyMode_turnOff
description: This function is used to turn off the robot vacuum's 'auto empty' function.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to turn off the 'auto empty' function.
